field.note: Defines the name of the form
If you re-order questions on this screen, you must commit before the changes will take effect. Questions appearing in blue are currently in a different position to where they started.

Add questions to the form by entering the name of the question in the text box and its type in the drop-down provided. This field will expand automatically to allow you to add more questions if desired. Any rows where both name and type are not filled in will be ignored.
If enabled, a format bodycopy will be created allowing you to customise the default format of this form. If disabled, a default format will be used.

Client-side validation refers to the use of JavaScript to prevent the form from submitting to the server if there are validation errors. Any errors will appear in a pop-up window when form submission is attempted. Note that server-side validation (checking of submitted data against validation rules) will always occur regardless of this setting.
Defines the name of the button to submit the form
Defines the name of the button to reset (clear) the form
